430:1: evaṃ khalu bhikṣavaśchandako bodhisattvādhisthānena rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyāśca sarvasya cāntaḥpurasya sarvasya ca śākyagaṇasya śokavinodakathāmakārṣīt||
430:2: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo lubdhakarūpāya devaputrāya kāśikāni vastrāṇi dattvā tasya sakāśātkāṣāyāni vastrāṇi gṛhītvā svayameva pravajyāṃ lokānuvartanāmupādāya sattvānukampāyai sattvaparipācanārtham||
430:3: atha bodhisattvo yenaiva śākyā brāhmaṇyā āśramastenopasaṃkrāmat|
430:4: sā bodhisattvaṃ vāsena bhaktena copanimantrayate sma|
430:5: tato bodhisattvaḥ padmāyā brāhmaṇyā āśramaṃ gacchati sma|
430:10: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo'nupūrveṇa vaiśālīṃ mahānagarīmanuprāpto'bhut||
430:11: tena khalu punaḥ samayenārāḍaḥ kālāpo vaiśālīmupanisṛtya prativasati sma mahatā śrāvakasaṃghena sārdhaṃ tribhiḥ śiṣyaśataiḥ|
430:12: sa śiṣyebhya ākiṃcanyāyatanasahavratāyai dharmaṃ deśayati sma|
430:13: sa bodhisattvaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptaḥ śiṣyānāmantrayate sma-paśyata paśyata bho rūpamasyeti|
430:16: tato'haṃ bhikṣavo yenārāḍaḥ kālāpastenopasaṃkramyārāḍa kālāpametadavocat-careyamahaṃ bho ārāḍe kālāpe brahmacaryam|
430:17: so'vocat-cara bho gautama tathārūpeṇa dharmākhyāne yasmin śrāddhaḥ kulaputro'lpakṛcchreṇājñāmārādhayati||
430:18: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-asti me chando'sti vīryamasti smṛtirasti samādhirasti prajñā,
430:19: yannvahameko'pramatta ātāpī vyapakṛṣṭo vihareyaṃ tasyaiva dharmasya prāptaye sākṣātkriyāyai||
430:20: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo eko'pramatta ātāpī vyapakṛṣṭo viharannalpakṛcchreṇaivaṃ taṃ dharmamadhyavagacchan sākṣādakārṣam||
430:21: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo yenārāḍaḥ kālāpastenopasaṃkramyaitadavocat-etāvadbho tvayā ārāḍa dharmo'dhigataḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ?
430:24: so'vocat-tena hi bho gautama yadahaṃ dharma jānāmi,
430:29: iti hi bhikṣava ārāḍaḥ kālāpaḥ paramayā pūjayā māṃ pūjayati sma|
430:30: antevāsiṣu ca māṃ samānārthatayā sthāpayati sma||
430:31: tasya me bhikṣava etadabhūt-ayaṃ khalvārāḍasya dharmo na nairyāṇiko na niryāti,
430:34: atha khalvahaṃ bhikṣavo yathābhirāmaṃ vaiśālyāṃ vihṛtya magadheṣu ca prakrānto'bhūt|
430:35: so'haṃ magadheṣu caryāṃ caran yena māgadhakānāṃ rājagṛhaṃ nagaraṃ tadanusṛto yena ca pāṇḍavaḥ parvatarājastenopasaṃkrānto'bhūvam|
430:37: tato'haṃ kalyameva saṃnivāsya pātracīvaramādāya tapodadvāreṇa rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat prāsādikenābhikrāntena pratikrāntena vyavalokitena saṃmiñjitena prasāritena prāsādikena saṃghāṭīpaṭapātracīvaradhāraṇenāvikṣiptairindriyairabahirgatena mānasena nirmitavattailapātradharavadyugamātraṃ paśyan|
430:38: tatra māṃ rājagṛhakā manuṣyā dṛṣṭvā vismitā abhūvan-kiṃ svidayaṃ brahmā bhaviṣyati śakro devānāmindra āhosvidvaiśravaṇo āhosvitkiṃcidgiridaivatam||
430:51: na ca bhavate kvaci tṛpti darśanena||3||
430:61: na ca puna sauṇḍa pibanti madyapānam|
430:62: na ca gṛhi na ca vīthiye ramante
430:103: iha mama rājyi vasāhi bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ||16||
430:107: ahu tava dāsyi prabhūta bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ||17||
430:108: mā ca puna vane vasāhi śūnye
430:111: iha mama rājyi vasāhi bhuṅkṣva kāmāṃ||18||
430:125: tatha api labdha na tṛpti vindayantī|
430:129: tatha api mānuṣa kāma ye praṇītā|
430:131: na ca so tṛpti labheta bhūyu eṣan||23||
430:135: na ca puna kāmaguṇeṣu kāci tṛptiḥ||24||
430:150: kva ca tava janma kva te pitā kva mātā|
430:160: yanu tava janma vayaṃ pi tasya śiṣyāḥ|
430:165: api ca mama purā sulabdha lābhā
